column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Went here today around 12:30. We only had a 3-4 minute wait
column3: as there is always a crowd outside waiting on the weekends.  I got the two eggs
column5: fruit cup instead of hashbrowns and the wildberry pancakes rather than toast to eat and a soy latte. The food was wonderful
column6: the pancakes were outstanding.  Can't wait to go back!
